name: Insignificant
blurb: An Open World RPG where you're three inches tall. Think Elder Scrolls meets Shadow of the Colossus meets The Borrowers.

rewards.reward: Forum Badge ============================= For any reward $10 and up, you'll get a Forum Badge on the Significant Games Forums, at forums.significantgames.com

Early Adopters ============================= \r\nFor the first 50 people who get here, I want to offer you a cheaper copy of the game to show my gratitude! You'll receive a DRM free digital copy of Insignificant for Mac, PC, or Linux, and a Steam key when it's released on Steam!
Insignificant ============================= \r\nReceive a DRM free digital copy of Insignificant for Mac, PC, or Linux, and a Steam key when it's released on Steam!

Insignificant BETA ============================= \r\nReceive a DRM free digital copy of Insignificant for Mac, PC, or Linux, and a Steam key when it's released on Steam! ============================= \r\nAlso get access to the Beta version where you'll be able to provide feedback and help shape the details of the game!

Insignificant & Digital Extras ============================= \r\nReceive a DRM free digital copy of Insignificant for Mac, PC, or Linux, and a Steam key when it's released on Steam, as well as Beta access. ============================= \r\nYou'll also receive high-res wallpapers, and a digital copy of the soundtrack!

Make Your Own Suffix ============================= Want to find a "Flossbow of The Random Number Generator?" This reward lets you toss your own suffix into mix and it will have a chance to randomly appear on an item in the game! Or you can choose a Spell name for the random spell name generator or a character name for the random character name generator! The possibilities are endless as long as you are very bad at math. Unlike a lot of the later rewards, you wont get a special item icon in the credits, because there's no specific item icon for me to use! ============================= You'll also receive a digital copy of the game, a Steam key, high-res wallpapers, and a digital copy of the soundtrack!

Improved Visuals ============================= This reward allows you to improve the look of the game! Each backer who chooses this reward will be in a special Visual Improvement Backer section of the credits. You'll also get the game, beta access, and digital stuff too! More information about this reward can be found in this update:  http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/significant/insignificant/posts/572026

Hats ============================= You can suggest a helmet, hat, or headgear for a character to wear as long as it fits the content guidelines over in the project description, or let me come up with an idea for you and reap all the rewards!
============================= 
You'll also receive a DRM free digital copy of Insignificant for Mac, PC, or Linux, and a Steam key when it's released on Steam, as well as Beta access. ============================= 
Why not also throw in some high-res wallpapers, and a digital copy of the soundtrack!

Weapons and Shields ============================= You can suggest a weapon or shield you'd like to appear in the game, and I'll make it as long as it fits the content guidelines over in the project description, or let me come up with an idea for you and reap all the rewards!
============================= 
You'll also receive a DRM free digital copy of Insignificant for Mac, PC, or Linux, and a Steam key when it's released on Steam, as well as Beta access. ============================= 
Why not also throw in some high-res wallpapers, and a digital copy of the soundtrack!

Armor ============================= I'll make you a single piece of armor for a character's Chest, Arms, Legs, or Feet. As long as it fits the content guidelines over in the project description, I'll do my best to make it! Or let me come up with an idea for you and reap all the rewards! These are a bit more complicated than hats, because they need to move with the character's body to some degree. ============================= You'll also receive a DRM free digital copy of Insignificant for Mac, PC, or Linux, and a Steam key when it's released on Steam, as well as Beta access. ============================= Why not also throw in some high-res wallpapers, and a digital copy of the soundtrack!

Character Customization ============================= I'll make you an additional character customization option, be it a new starting hood, face, shirt, or pants! As long as it fits the content guidelines over in the project description, I'll do my best to make it! Or let me come up with an idea for you and reap all the rewards!
============================= 
You'll also receive a DRM free digital copy of Insignificant for Mac, PC, or Linux, and a Steam key when it's released on Steam, as well as Beta access. ============================= 
Why not also throw in some high-res wallpapers, and a digital copy of the soundtrack!

Full Armor Set ============================= I'll add a full armor set to the game, which includes as many as you want of the following slots: head, legs, chest, arms and feet! If it's something that could reasonably be crafted by a character, I'll add it to the armor crafting system! As long as it fits the content guidelines over in the project description, I'll do my best to make it. Or let me come up with an idea for you and reap all the rewards! This one is a lot of work because it actually involves making roughly ten objects as opposed to just one.
============================= 
You'll also receive a DRM free digital copy of Insignificant for Mac, PC, or Linux, and a Steam key when it's released on Steam, as well as Beta access. ============================= 
Why not also throw in some high-res wallpapers, and a digital copy of the soundtrack!

Enemies ============================= I'll add any enemy you suggest to the game, as long as it fits the content guidelines over in the project description. Or let me come up with an idea for you and reap all the rewards! This one's even more work than the previous options, as enemies need to be rigged and animated, but I'll do it for you, because you're cool.
============================= 
You'll also receive a DRM free digital copy of Insignificant for Mac, PC, or Linux, and a Steam key when it's released on Steam, as well as Beta access. ============================= 
Why not also throw in some high-res wallpapers, and a digital copy of the soundtrack!

Rewardmancer ============================= Singlehandedly add a new Mancy to the game.  I'll develop and program a new Mancy of your choosing. A Mancy is basically a character class but instead of a Thief, you'd be a Shadowmancer and instead of a Monk, you'd be a Punchmancer. If you have an idea for something cool, as long as I can manage to add it, I'll use it, but if you just want more options, I'll run some ideas past you and find something fun to add!  ============================= Of course, you'll also receive a DRM free digital copy of Insignificant for Mac, PC, or Linux, a Steam key, Beta access, digital wallpapers and a digital soundtrack too. (tl;dr, you get all that other stuff too)

God  ============================= To the Outsiders, we humans appear to be Titans. Some may even refer to them as Gods. To whomever chooses this reward tier, you will become one of those Titans. Will the player choose to observe you, or attempt to slay you? The titan will share the name and relative likeness either of you or the person you choose. You will also receive any of the other rewards you wish.
